alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:55PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Albany County through 545 PM MDT... At 455 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bosler, or 19 miles north of Laramie, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bosler. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range
